item.title: What language am I looking for?
item.description: If you ask anyone who knows me what my thoughts are on javascript, you will get a unanimous “he hates it”. Typescript helps, but it doesn’t fix the problems. I don’t believe the problems I have with it are actually solvable without some radical changes in the ecosystem. Why do I care so much? Because I freaking want to build websites that stick around for a while goddamnit! Sites built with the “right decisions” today feel like they fall over from a strong breeze.
